name: Cave Escape (itch) (Rad Chad (Derek))
description:
In Cave Escape, you play as Allesandro Romano, owner of Romano's Pizza, the best pizza in Brooklyn. Allesandro Romano, owner of Romano's Pizza, the best pizza in Brooklyn, has fallen into a vast cave! He must search around the cave to find an exit, so he can get back to his restaurant! He might need to hurry, though, as he feels like he might not be alone...

Help Allesandro Romano, owner of Romano's Pizza, the best pizza in Brooklyn, escape the cave with his life!


Credit:
Music - They mostly come at night... Mostly... as well as Elsewhere by Jim Hall

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/rpg-worlds-caves-167274
Enemy Pathfinding from A* Pathfinding Project
https://arongranberg.com/astar/
This game was made by Derek Reynolds using Unity.
